info.name: WSO2 Identity Server - UserStore Rest API
info.description:
This is the RESTful API for user store management related operations in WSO2 Identity Server


Contact Support:
 Name: WSO2 Identity Server
 Email: architecture@wso2.org

item.name: Retrieve the configurations of secondary user store based on its domain id.

variable.description: The unique name of the user store domain

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve the configurations of secondary user store based on its domain id. Permission required: */permission/admin

response.name: The specified resource is not found.

variable.description: The unique name of the user store domain

request.description: This API provides the capability to delete a secondary user store matching to the given user store domain id. Permission required: */permission/admin

response.name: The specified resource is not found.

item.name: Update a user store by its domain id.

variable.description: Current domain id of the user store

request.description: This API provides the capability to edit a user store based on its domain id. Permission required: */permission/admin

response.name: The specified resource is not found.

item.name: Patch the secondary user store by it's domain id.

variable.description: The unique name of the user store domain

request.description: This API provides the capability to update the secondary user store's property using patch request by using it's domain id. Permission required: */permission/admin

response.name: The specified resource is not found.

item.name: Retrieve the available user store classes/types.

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve the available user store types. Permission required: */permission/admin

item.name: Retrieve the properties of secondary user store of a given user store type.

query.description: maximum number of records to return
number of records to skip for pagination
Condition to filter the retrival of records.
Define the order how the retrieved records should be sorted.

variable.description: Id of the user store type

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve the properties of secondary user store of a given class name. Permission required: */permission/admin

response.name: The specified resource is not found.

request.description: This API provides the capability to add a secondary user store. Permission required: */permission/admin

header.description: Location of the newly created secondary userstore. userstore id is generated as base-64-url-encoded(domain-name) value.

item.name: Retrieve or List the configured secondary user stores.

query.description: maximum number of records to return
number of records to skip for pagination
Condition to filter the retrival of records.
Define the order how the retrieved records should be sorted.

request.description: This API provides the capability to list the configured secondary userstores. Permission required: */permission/admin

response.name: The specified resource is not found.

item.name: Test the connection to the datasource used by a JDBC user store manager.

request.description: This API provides the capability to test the connection to the datasource used by a JDBC user store manager. Permission required: */permission/admin
